-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Generic implementation of Storable
--   
--   Generic implementation of Storable
@package generic-storable
@version 0.1.0.0

module Foreign.Storable.Generic

-- | Generic Storable class
class GStorable f where galignment = gsizeOf gpeekByteOff addr off = gpeek (addr `plusPtr` off) gpeekElemOff addr idx = gpeek (addr `plusPtr` (idx * gsizeOf (undefined :: f a))) gpokeByteOff addr off x = gpoke (addr `plusPtr` off) x gpokeElemOff addr idx x = gpoke (addr `plusPtr` (idx * gsizeOf (undefined :: f a))) x
gsizeOf :: GStorable f => f a -> Int
galignment :: GStorable f => f a -> Int
gpeek :: GStorable f => Ptr (f a) -> IO (f a)
gpeekByteOff :: GStorable f => Ptr (f a) -> Int -> IO (f a)
gpeekElemOff :: GStorable f => Ptr (f a) -> Int -> IO (f a)
gpoke :: GStorable f => Ptr (f a) -> f a -> IO ()
gpokeByteOff :: GStorable f => Ptr (f a) -> Int -> f a -> IO ()
gpokeElemOff :: GStorable f => Ptr (f a) -> Int -> f a -> IO ()
sizeOfDefault :: (Generic a, GStorable (Rep a)) => a -> Int
alignmentDefault :: (Generic a, GStorable (Rep a)) => a -> Int
peekDefault :: (Generic a, GStorable (Rep a)) => Ptr a -> IO a
peekByteOffDefault :: (Generic a, GStorable (Rep a)) => Ptr a -> Int -> IO a
peekElemOffDefault :: (Generic a, GStorable (Rep a)) => Ptr a -> Int -> IO a
pokeDefault :: (Generic a, GStorable (Rep a)) => Ptr a -> a -> IO ()
pokeByteOffDefault :: (Generic a, GStorable (Rep a)) => Ptr a -> Int -> a -> IO ()
pokeElemOffDefault :: (Generic a, GStorable (Rep a)) => Ptr a -> Int -> a -> IO ()
newtype StorableWrapper a
StorableWrapper :: a -> StorableWrapper a
unStorableWrapper :: StorableWrapper a -> a
instance Storable a => GStorable (K1 i a)
instance GStorable a => GStorable (M1 i c a)
instance (GStorable a, GStorable b) => GStorable (a :+: b)
instance (GStorable a, GStorable b) => GStorable (a :*: b)
instance GStorable U1
instance (Generic a, GStorable (Rep a)) => Storable (StorableWrapper a)
